Question: ELECTRA IC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ELECTRA IC

Product Highlights at CES 2024

 - Design Solutions: Unveiling of advanced design solutions that streamline the design process
 - Cutting-edge Technologies: Development of technologies to reduce time-to-market
 - Product Quality Enhancement: Improvements to enhance the overall quality of products
 - Recruitment: Seeking engineers for 5G/6G technology and senior 5G embedded software design
 - Services: ASIC/FPGA and embedded software design & verification services
